statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 16 \\ -6 \\ 8 \\ 22 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ 36 \\ -17 \\ 12 \\ 49 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
